aiplatform.desc2-1: Polypharmacology requires a deep understanding of interactions among drugs, <1/> proteins, cells, and diseases, alongside the ability to predict and identify novel biological relationships. <1/> To address this complexity, AriBio’s Platform Research Center has developed ARIS: <1/> a proprietary AI platform optimized for predicting these multifaceted biological interrelationships, <1/> thus advancing our drug discovery initiatives.
